section.name: The Registration Web Application
section.p: This application is conform to the servlet standard. It will (hopefully) run on any standard compliant servlet container (if not use tomcat).

subsection.name: Configure it
subsection.p: You'll have to configure the connection to the database. You can do this with cayenne.

subsection.name: Build it
subsection.p: You can build the webapp using ant. Adapt build.xml to your needs.

subsection.name: Deploy it
subsection.p: After running ant, you'll have a jadabs-im.war file. You can for example deploy it using the tomcat manager (included in standard disrtribution)
